name: TrashShips
description:
You are a mechanic and steam ship builder. People from all over the place come to buy your ships. There mighty cheap, are tailored to your costumer needs and most of the time they don't completely blow apart before getting where it should.

Try and build the ships before the time limit, and remember to fulfill the requirements.

(Wait for the thing to load, it could take a long time just showing a black screen).
